title: BrandyBot - AI Branding Toolkit
description: AI-powered branding toolkit developed as a final-year project, featuring logo generation, brand guideline creation, mockup generation, and an interactive chatbot. Built using a full-stack architecture with AI model integration for practical branding use cases.

title: GeoInsight Dashboard
description: Geography-based data visualization dashboard built to aggregate and display data. Implements responsive UI, API integration, and real-time updates for analytical insights.

title: Mental Health Model Training
description: Machine learning project focused on training and evaluating models using publicly available mental health datasets. Includes data preprocessing, exploratory analysis, and model evaluation for academic learning purposes.

title: Academic Risk Prediction System
description: Academic performance risk prediction system developed using machine learning models such as XGBoost and Random Forest. Incorporates SHAP and LIME techniques to improve model explainability and understanding.

title: HerVoice - Safety App
description: Mobile safety application developed to support UN SDG 5 (Gender Equality). Includes emergency alerts, live location sharing, SMS notifications, and Firebase-based authentication.

title: Oven Crust Bakery System
description: Complete bakery management system with website, admin panel, product catalog, and order tracking. Features CRUD operations and user authentication.

title: Lesson Planner System - Java
description: A Java-based lesson planner system using MVC architecture and MySQL. The system features a user login interface, lesson management, teacher management, and CRUD functionalities.

title: Daily Mirror Website Redesign (Group)
description: A redesign of the Daily Mirror website focusing on improving UI/UX design, navigation, and user interaction. Implemented a modern, user-friendly layout while enhancing the responsiveness of the website.
